timeline.message: byte[] type handling in deserialize and finalizeComputation for DoubleMeanAggregatorFactory
DoubleMeanAggregatorFactory tests: Max Intermediate Size, Deserialize, finalizeComputation

timeline.bodyText: can we make byte[] be  the firs if check in both  places ?
timeline.author: himanshug

replies.bodyText: But DoubleMeanHolder in both places too. Maybe we will replace only String in deserialize(..)?
replies.author: aP0StAl

replies.bodyText: I meant, just move the byte[] check as being the first check in if-statement chain as I am expecting that would be the case most of the time.
replies.author: himanshug

timeline.message: moved byte[] check to first position
